name: AMWorkflow
desc: An object that lets you use an Automator workflow in your app.

items.name: init(contentsOf: URL)
items.desc: Creates and initializes a workflow based on the contents of the specified file.

items.name: class func run(at: URL, withInput: Any?) -> Any
items.desc: Loads and runs the specified workflow file.

items.name: func write(to: URL)
items.desc: Writes the workflow to the specified file.

items.name: var actions: [AMAction]
items.desc: An array of the workflowâ€™s actions.

items.name: var fileURL: URL?
items.desc: A URL that specifies the location of the workflow file.

items.name: func valueForVariable(withName: String) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the value of the workflow variable with the specified name.

items.name: var input: Any?
items.desc: The input data that is passed to the first action in the workflow.

items.name: var output: Any?
items.desc: The output data that is provided by the last action in the workflow.

items.name: func setValue(Any?, forVariableWithName: String) -> Bool
items.desc: Sets the value of the workflow variable with the specified name.

items.name: func addAction(AMAction)
items.desc: Adds the specified action at the end of the receiving workflow.

items.name: func insertAction(AMAction, at: Int)
items.desc: Inserts the specified action at the specified position of the receiving workflow.

items.name: func moveAction(at: Int, to: Int)
items.desc: Moves the action from the specified start position to the specified end position in the receiving workflow.

items.name: func removeAction(AMAction)
items.desc: Removes the specified action from the workflow.
